features: Room Darkening technology blocks out some unwanted light while enhancing privacy
Energy efficient design reduces energy lost through your windows by up to 25%
Thermal properties help keep summer heat and winter chill out of your home
Noise reduction up to 25% helps you get a sounder, more uninterrupted sleep
Built-in metal grommets fit curtain rods up to 1.5" in diameter
Note: These are room darkening curtains and amount of light blocked depends on how dark the base color is
body.description: Sun Zero Barrow Energy Efficient Curtains bring style and energy efficiency to any home. The woven solid design with an easy to hang grommet-top offers a classic style that fits in with any room decor while reducing light and noise for better sleep; help keep your home cooler in the summer and warmer in the winter. Room darkening panels are made of materials that reduce light, and considerably darken the room. Some light will show through. These materials do not allow a view through and provide complete privacy. The darker the color the better the light reducing capabilities. Sold individually. Hang on a rod up to 1.5 inch in diameter. Polyester. Washable. Imported.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us Sun Zero curtains are the total solution. Fashion + performance all in one!Sun Zero curtains are a practical and affordable way to beautify any room in your house. They will help insulate your home, reduce energy loss, reduce outside noise, and enhance privacy.Windows are one of the major areas of heat and cooling loss in your home. In the summer, Sun Zero curtains block the sun’s rays to keep your room cool. In winter, Sun Zero curtains trap air and help maintain the temperature in your home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the textureGreat buyJust beautiful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2020
reviews.reviewText: We purchased 3 panels in teal. The color matches with one another and the Amazon listing. As they're folded, they'll have wrinkles when unfolded. After hanging for about 3 weeks, nearly all the wrinkles have come out and we're pleased with how they hang and look. I wouldn't call these curtains heat blockers (or insulators for warm or cold weather), nor would I say they are special light blocking draperies. I have purchased drapery from a different Seller that have the sun and weather backing on the reverse side of the drapery and they truly work well (they're ivory and it's amazing how well they block light). These teal drapes are not cheapy curtains that let the sunlight filter through like sheer drapery, but certainly not light blockers either. The grommets are fitted well and all three panels (separate orders) are the same length. For these draperies, we did not purchase them with the intent of being light blockers, not temperature insulators; we just wanted some long, reasonably priced teal curtains for our sliders, these meet our expectations for that purpose and deserve our 5 star review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like the aquamarine color.Unfortunately they are very thin.They are definitely room darkening but not a blackout drape.The price is really good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not what expected but nice
reviews.reviewText: I might have misread the description but these aren't exactly light blocking or energy efficient. They're not sheer but they definitely let in as much light as my traditional curtains and I don't think the backing is preventing the heat from getting through. I was hoping for both. That said, they are beautiful. They hang smoothly and the color is exactly what I wanted. They have a light, silky feel but so far, don't seem to be the pet hair magnet that silk usually is. They seem well made and I expect they'll last years. While the windows are well covered, I might buy extras to try to add/thicken coverage to help with the room darkening. Especially the south facing window. Overall decent purchase but if you need a really dark room, these won't do that. Picture looks as if curtains don't cover the window. That's just the morning cats/dog having to watch the rabbits. Lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Household items such as curtains and rugs can be expensive, but I found these and thought they’d be worth a shot. I ended up ordering more. I got the sage green looking ones, and they are great for darkening rooms and so pretty

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the price, good deal
reviews.reviewText: Just installed these today. For the low price, they are great. Nice color to match my room. They are not thick so TBD on the sheerness during the day (I expect and wanted it to let some light in but give privacy) and TBD on energy efficiency. I do want it to help block some of the cold air from getting in when it's cold to help save on heating bills so we shall see.They did come pretty wrinkled but it's nothing an iron or steaming cannot fix. This was a main concern when I read reviews but it's an easy fix.If you're on a budget and want something cute for your room, these are it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: I originally ordered 4 of these but only opened 1. The blush pink is more of a cool dusty pink, and would go better with grays and blues than browns and beiges. I wound up ordering similar deconovo curtains that cost me about $17 more for the total 4I knew what I was getting into ordering the cheapest 95" curtains you can find on amazon. They are pretty thin, and expect the lines of sunlight that shine through your blinds to show through these. More crimps help, but these do a good job of softening and diffusing light.I didn't rate them higher because the panel I opened and inspected was actually slightly slanted at the bottom, as in it hung so that the left bottom corner hung just over an inch lower than the right. If you're tying these up to use as accent or letting them really pillow on the floor around the window, I don't think it would be really too noticable.I wound up returning all 4, but moreso over the color than the quality. The picture is of the two panels side by side. It's a clear bump in quality and the deconovo curtains are very near blackout in my west facing florida window in the summer, compared to the sunzero which were really barely passable as thermal curtains. The seams and stitching, as well as the backing are a much higher quality on the deconovo panel. You can also see the difference in the satin sheen, but really, a lot of these factors come down to preference, and they are a really affordable alternative if you don't need the heftier curtains.The return went very smoothy and I'm happy with the customer service, but I still want to point out the inconsistency in length, and the sheerness of curtains that are really going to disappoint people who look at the marketing and think they'll block a lot of light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Exactly how it is on the picture
Buena opción de compra y es muy bonita

Las cortinas cumplieron mis expectativas. Están hermosas, la calidad y la tela son excelentes, las compraré en otros tonos para otras habitaciones, además tienen el bloqueo adecuado cubriendo la luz un 80 %. La tela es suave y de apariencia elegante.

These are really nice curtains. The color is amazing! I got these to put on my bedroom wall like an accent wall (too lazy to paint and I don't want to have to paint it back white later on) and these work really well for it. They are super pretty

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent curtains for the price - dark blush/ mauve
reviews.reviewText: Love these curtains!! Ordered a bunch of different ones for this nursery but these ones worked best for our colour scheme. Need to be steamed after arrival and I hemmed them 4” to fit our space. They match almost exact with our walls which at “Hint of mauve” by Benjamin Moore if you need a reference for colour. I would say they are more dark blush / mauve in colour which is what we wanted. Great price point!
